## ðŸ“ Notes

### How to Update This File

**Weekly (AI can automate this):**
```bash
@workspace Update .github/METRICS.md with latest stats:
- Check GitHub stars, forks, watchers
- Check npm download stats
- Check open issues/PRs
- Update weekly tracking section
```

**Monthly (Human review):**
- Review goals progress
- Analyze trends
- Adjust targets if needed
- Celebrate wins! ðŸŽ‰

### Data Sources
- GitHub API: `https://api.github.com/repos/sathvikc/lume-js`
- npm API: `https://api.npmjs.org/downloads/point/last-week/lume-js`
- Bundle size: `npm run size`
- Test coverage: `npm run coverage`
